English: same as `爵位~[jue2 wei4], order of feudal nobility, namely: Duke `公~[gong1], Marquis `侯~[hou2], Count `伯~[bo2], Viscount `子~[zi3], Baron `男~[nan2]
francais: ordre de la noblesse féodale (à savoir: duc, marquis, comte, vicomte, Baron)
